topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5330dd1563687267a7670200#post_5330dd1563687267a7670200
That's either good or bad.

Step 1: Make sure bed is comfy, Step 2: Make sure bed is you're bed or indeed a bed, Step 3: lift covers, Step 4: Get under cover, Step 5: Put cover over self, Step 6: Pray to the all mighty Jontron for forgiveness of you're sins, Step 7: Close you're fucking eyes Dammit, Step 8: Count the Jumping Slim Shady's, Step 9: Read Step 10, Step 10: _*GO TO FUCKING SLEEP*_
